verses.name: Matthew 13:12
verses.text: For whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance: but whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken away even that he hath.

verses.name: Matthew 13:13
verses.text: Therefore speak I to them in parables: because they seeing see not; and hearing they hear not, neither do they understand.

verses.name: Matthew 13:14
verses.text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias, which saith, By hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and shall not perceive:
